thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: The staff at the Torrington location is very professional and friendly! The wait was painless with the friendliness of the staff. Juan in particular was extremely professional and helpful and made the proper suggestions for all my tire and wheel needs. I will be returning to this location in the future! Thank you Juan!!
